title: metaf1
author: metaf1
created_time: May 23, 2022, 11:36:05 AMLast edit: May 23, 2022, 12:20:06 PM by metaf1
content: MetaF1 builds a bridge between Formula 1 and the open metaverse, offering gamers, developers and investors innovative ways to connect and provide opportunities for every gamer, whether casual or professional, to make money by doing what they love, thanks to the MetaF1 Network and the crypto currency, MetaF1 Token ($F1T). https://i.imgur.com/nLOhRIT.pngAs the MetaF1 team, our key focus is to maximize open meta-data transfer technology on the blockchain, among other integrations for gamers, developers and investors. The vision of MetaF1  is to create a decentralized open metaverse with Formula 1 excitement. Many advantages await players and investors in this open metaverse. They can join races, bet on races, participate in prize-winning tournaments, create and trade NFTs and meet real Formula 1 legends...In addition, players and investors can join Formula 1 organizations with their MetaF1 ($F1T) tokens and collect the NFTs of these moments in their wallets in the future .Race To Earn MetaF1 is a virtual game metaverse based on the Race to Earn concept that brings Formula-1 to the blockchain. The user can create their avatar with a crypto wallet and join this metaverse; can participate in races, produce NFT content and much more.There are 3 classes of Formula in MetaF1;🏎 Begginner Class Formula generates $15 per day 🏎  Advanced Class Formula generates $25 per day 🏎  Expert Class Formula generates $43.75 per day MetaF1 is a virtual game metaverse that brings Formula-1 to the blockchain. The user can create their avatar with a crypto wallet and join this metaverse; can participate in races, produce NFT content and much more…MetaF1 game will have 4 different modes in the first stage. More Details: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-g_oycd6GTc&t=4sBUY $F1T GET NFTs! If you buy 1 BNB worth of F1T from the pre-sale, you will receive an Advaced Formula NFT gift with a daily return of $25. https://i.imgur.com/qic2jU8.jpgIf you buy 5 BNB worth of F1T from the pre-sale, you will receive an Advaced Formula NFT gift with a daily return of $43,5. https://i.imgur.com/LROl566.pngMODS:🏴☠️ RACE MODE 🏴☠️ The winner of the 12-lap race receives the prize in the pool.- To participate in the race, a specified amount of MetaF1 tokens is required.- The prize pool consists of MetaF1 Token ($F1T) deposited by participants to participate.- The winner gets 70% of the prize in the pool.- 20% burned, 10% distributed to MetaF1 Token ($F1T) holders.🚩 STRATEGY MODE 🚩 You will be able to take over team by winning in a long season race.Race with your team on different tracks, collect points. The team with the most points will be the champion!- To participate in the race, a specified amount of MetaF1 tokens is required.- The prize pool consists of MetaF1 Token ($F1T) deposited by participants to participate.- The winner gets 70% of the prize in the pool.- 20% burned, 10% distributed to MetaF1 Token ($F1T) holders.🏁CASUAL MODE 🏁Casual mode allows you to freely roam and explore the metaverse. In casual mode, owners can customize their land, build garages and trade NFT assets.-You only need to hold a certain amount of $F1T to play casual modes.🏎 Profession Mode 🏎This concept, which is in the process of artistic development. Design vehicle equipment/modifications, Create / Join a team, etc. - Designer interface to be added by MetaF1 Network- A certain amount of MetaF1 Tokens is required to mint designs as NFTs on the MetaF1 Network½0 Buy and SELL TAXKYC&AUDITED Join US!Official Links: https://linktr.ee/metaf1PreSale Link: https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0x2716a194CC5b35c8a3c6A34E56969F5A82388B49?chain=BSC
